channel.description: Recent content in deepdive on limitexception.com

item.title: Professional Development with AWS
item.description: The History For 21 years I’ve hosted my personal website and miscellaneous experiments on Dreamhost. Dreamhost was where I first setup my website. My sites and content there have survived countless life milestones. I started out hosting private projects in HTML built in Microsoft Frontpage, HotDog, Macromedia Dreamweaver. From then I moved on to teaching myself PHP, building basic content management systems before the days of Wordpress. For many, many years it languished.

item.title: Salesforce Platform Events, a quick dive into EventBus.RetryableException
